title: Journal of Research in Ayurvedic Sciences
description: J Res Ayurvedic Sci, Official publication of Central Council for Research in Ayurvedic Sciences (CCRAS), Ministry of AYUSH, New Delhi,India
cleaned_text: Research in Ayurvedic Sciences, a publication of Central Council for Research in Ayurvedic Sciences (CCRAS), Ministry of AYUSH, New Delhi, is a peer-reviewed print + online Quarterly journal. Features of Manuscript Management System - Online submission - Wider visibility through open access - Higher impact - Prompt review
